thread.title: Syrian White Helmet to Skip Oscars Amid Airstrikes
thread.title_full: Syrian White Helmet to Skip Oscars Amid Airstrikes

author: Mark Hanrahan and Associated Press and Rima Abdelkader
title: Syrian White Helmet to Skip Oscars Amid Airstrikes
text: Civil Defense workers and Syrian citizens carry a Seif al-Dawleh nighborhood in Aleppo, Syria, on Nov. 19. Government bombardment of besieged rebel-held neighborhoods in the northern city of Aleppo killed at least 20 people Saturday Syrian opposition activists said, a day after the health directorate said all hospital in opposition areas have been knocked out of service.
